identifier.description: Must be unique within the DKAN catalog. Alphanumeric, dash (-) and underscore (_) characeters only.

extract.description: Information on the extract method for this harvest plan.

type.description: Qualified name of a PHP class that implements the \Harvest\ETL\Extract\IExctract interface.

uri.description: URI to the source to extract from.

transforms.description: List of transforms applied after extract. Transforms are qualified PHP class names that extend the \Harvest\ETL\Transform\Transform base class.

type.description: Qualified name of a PHP class that extends the Harvest\ETL\Load base class.
